p: Among the samples, seven fecal samples of seven individual bats were identified as paramyxovirus-positive, and in these bats, two individuals belong to Hipposideros cineraceus (sampled in the Yuanjiang Gulong hole), one of Rousettus leschenaultii, one of Eonycteris spelaea, one of Hipposideros armiger (sampled from the Xishuangbanna Botanical Garden, Mengla, China), and three Taphozous melanopogon (sampled in Natural Arch, Mengla, China) ( Table S1). The ~560-bp L-gene sequences were submitted to GenBank (Accession No. KC599255, KC599257- KC599261, KC599263).
